messages.speaker: User
messages.content: Hi there, I am an LLM student currently working on an essay on culture and compliance. May I find out if there are any resources in the library which I can use to assist me in my essay?

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: more specifically, my essay is on establishing a compliance culture in organisations

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: have you tried using our library search?

messages.speaker: User
messages.content: do you mean https://library.smu.edu.sg/ this link?

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: if you searched using terms like "compliance culture"

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: then u can use the filters on the side to narrow down your results

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: play around with a variety of search terms and see which fits the research topic well

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: is there anything else i can assist?

messages.speaker: Helpdesk
messages.content: do drop by again if you have other queries
